changeSet.author: paulsc
changeSet.comment: De activates the un-used tests for the ELISA algorithm

update.where: name in ( 'Bioline','p24 Ag','Western Blot 2','Western Blot 1','Genie II 10','Genie II 100','Genie II' )

changeSet.author: paulsc
changeSet.comment: Add Innolia as test and dictionary values for test results

column.name: id
column.valueNumeric: nextval( 'test_seq' )

column.name: test_section_id
column.valueNumeric: (select id from clinlims.test_section where name = 'Serology')

column.name: id
column.valueNumeric: nextval( 'analyte_seq' )

column.name: id
column.valueNumeric: nextval( 'test_analyte_seq' )

column.name: test_id
column.valueNumeric: ( select id from clinlims.test where name = 'Innolia')

column.name: analyte_id
column.valueNumeric: ( select id from clinlims.analyte where name = 'Innolia Results' )

column.name: id
column.valueNumeric: nextval( 'sample_type_test_seq' )

column.name: sample_type_id
column.valueNumeric: (select id from clinlims.type_of_sample where description = 'Dry Tube' )

column.name: test_id
column.valueNumeric: (select id from clinlims.test where name = 'Innolia' )

changeSet.author: paulsc
changeSet.comment: Remove unused reflexes and add those for Innolia

column.name: add_test_id
column.valueNumeric: (select id from clinlims.test where name = 'Innolia' )

update.where: add_test_id = (select id from clinlims.test where name = 'Genie II')

delete.where: test_id in (select id from clinlims.test where name in ('Bioline','p24 Ag','Western Blot 2','Western Blot 1','Genie II 10','Genie II 100','Genie II' )) OR add_test_id in (select id from clinlims.test where name in ('Bioline','p24 Ag','Western Blot 2','Western Blot 1','Genie II 10','Genie II 100','Genie II' ))

column.name: id
column.valueNumeric: nextval( 'test_reflex_seq' )

column.name: test_id
column.valueNumeric: ( select id from clinlims.test where name = 'Innolia' )

column.name: tst_rslt_id
column.valueNumeric: ( select id from clinlims.test_result where test_id = ( select id from clinlims.test where name ='Innolia' ) and cast ( value as numeric) in ( select id from clinlims.dictionary where dict_entry = 'HIV1' ))

column.name: test_analyte_id
column.valueNumeric: ( select id from clinlims.test_analyte where analyte_id = ( select id from clinlims.analyte where name = 'Innolia Results' ))

column.name: scriptlet_id
column.valueNumeric: ( select id from clinlims.scriptlet where name = 'HIV Status HIV 1' )

column.name: id
column.valueNumeric: nextval( 'test_reflex_seq' )

column.name: test_id
column.valueNumeric: ( select id from clinlims.test where name = 'Innolia' )

column.name: tst_rslt_id
column.valueNumeric: ( select id from clinlims.test_result where test_id = ( select id from clinlims.test where name ='Innolia' ) and cast ( value as numeric) in ( select id from clinlims.dictionary where dict_entry = 'HIV2' ))

column.name: test_analyte_id
column.valueNumeric: ( select id from clinlims.test_analyte where analyte_id = ( select id from clinlims.analyte where name = 'Innolia Results' ))

column.name: scriptlet_id
column.valueNumeric: ( select id from clinlims.scriptlet where name = 'HIV Status HIV 2' )

column.name: id
column.valueNumeric: nextval( 'test_reflex_seq' )

column.name: test_id
column.valueNumeric: ( select id from clinlims.test where name = 'Innolia' )

column.name: tst_rslt_id
column.valueNumeric: ( select id from clinlims.test_result where test_id = ( select id from clinlims.test where name ='Innolia' ) and cast ( value as numeric) in ( select id from clinlims.dictionary where dict_entry = 'HIVD' ))

column.name: test_analyte_id
column.valueNumeric: ( select id from clinlims.test_analyte where analyte_id = ( select id from clinlims.analyte where name = 'Innolia Results' ))

column.name: scriptlet_id
column.valueNumeric: ( select id from clinlims.scriptlet where name = 'HIV Status HIV D' )

column.name: id
column.valueNumeric: nextval( 'test_reflex_seq' )

column.name: test_id
column.valueNumeric: ( select id from clinlims.test where name = 'Innolia' )

column.name: tst_rslt_id
column.valueNumeric: ( select id from clinlims.test_result where test_id = ( select id from clinlims.test where name ='Innolia' ) and cast ( value as numeric) in ( select id from clinlims.dictionary where dict_entry = 'Negative' ))

column.name: test_analyte_id
column.valueNumeric: ( select id from clinlims.test_analyte where analyte_id = ( select id from clinlims.analyte where name = 'Innolia Results' ))

column.name: scriptlet_id
column.valueNumeric: ( select id from clinlims.scriptlet where name = 'HIV Status Negative' )

column.name: id
column.valueNumeric: nextval( 'test_reflex_seq' )

column.name: test_id
column.valueNumeric: ( select id from clinlims.test where name = 'Innolia' )

column.name: tst_rslt_id
column.valueNumeric: ( select id from clinlims.test_result where test_id = ( select id from clinlims.test where name ='Innolia' ) and cast ( value as numeric) in ( select id from clinlims.dictionary where dict_entry = 'Indeterminate' ))

column.name: test_analyte_id
column.valueNumeric: ( select id from clinlims.test_analyte where analyte_id = ( select id from clinlims.analyte where name = 'Innolia Results' ))

column.name: scriptlet_id
column.valueNumeric: ( select min(id) from clinlims.scriptlet where name = 'HIV Status Indeterminate' )

column.valueNumeric: (select id from clinlims.test where name = 'Glycémie' )

changeSet.author: paulsc
changeSet.comment: adding Cobas C311 role and adding correct modules to role

column.name: id
column.valueNumeric: nextval( 'system_role_seq' )

column.name: description
column.value: Able to verigy results for Cobas C311 analyzer

column.name: grouping_parent
column.valueNumeric: (select id from clinlims.system_role where name = 'Biochemistry automatic' )

column.name: id
column.valueNumeric: nextval( 'system_user_module_seq' )

column.name: system_role_id
column.valueNumeric: currval( 'system_role_seq' )

column.name: system_module_id
column.valueNumeric: ( select id from clinlims.system_module where name = 'AnalyzerResults:cobasc311')

column.valueNumeric: nextval( 'system_user_module_seq' )

column.valueNumeric: ( select id from clinlims.system_role where name = '' )

column.valueNumeric: ( select id from clinlims.system_module where name = 'AnalyzerResults:cobasc311')
